casebody.data:
EDWARD F. MACROWSKI ET AL. v. PLANNING AND ZONING COMMISSION OF THE TOWN OF STRATFORD* The Supreme Court docket number is SC 16416. Shelley R. Sadin, in support of the petition. Gregory P. Lynch, in opposition. Decided October 31, 2000

The appeal was withdrawn September 21, 2001.

*950MCDONALD, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.
